name: Ayaan Panda
about: I'm a backend programmer, mainly machine learning and deep learning, as well as automation and API development. I have been coding for over 2 years and have made numerous projects and lots of freelancing as well. I share knowledge and document my journey through YouTube(and soon to be blog)!

1.heading: Self Driving Car
1.about: A virtual Self Driving Car that works in games like GTA.

2.heading: Voice Assistant
2.about: An assistant that can do various daily tasks, all powered by voice.

3.heading: Fy
3.about: A project currently in the makings, Spotify but ad-free listening + AI generated music.
